content:
As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future or make definitive statements about the Canadiens' chances of winning the Stanley Cup based on their new acquisitions. The outcome of a season depends on many different factors that are difficult to predict, including injuries, team chemistry, and performance under pressure.

That being said, the Canadiens' new acquisitions could certainly improve their chances of success this season. By adding skilled players who can help them score more goals or bolster their defense, they may become stronger contenders in their conference. Additionally, if the new players can gel well with the existing players and fit into the team's system, it could lead to improved overall performance on the ice.

However, it's worth noting that success in the NHL is never guaranteed, and any team can have a bad season or suffer a major setback. The Canadiens will need to work hard and remain consistent throughout the season to have a chance at winning the Stanley Cup.
